short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scrolls and replies to GM (Good morning) & GN (Good Night) tweets on X / Twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate "Good Morning" & "Good Night" Replies on Twitter & X.com (Free to use!)

Save time and connect with followers automatically!

Xtools lets you schedule custom greetings for "Good Morning", "GM", "Good Night", and "GN" messages on Twitter and X.com

üëâ How it works:

1. Log in to X.com
2. Click the Xtools extension
3. Personalize your messages and response speed
4. Go to your timeline and launch Xtools
